rukus.text: Wa Yawma Nahshuru Min Kulli 'Ummatin Fawjaan Mimman Yukadhibu Bi'ayatina Fahum Yuza`una
Hatta 'Idha Ja'u Qala 'Akadhabtum Bi'ayati Wa Lam Tuhitu Biha `Ilmaan 'Ammadha Kuntum Ta`maluna
Wa Waqa`a Al-Qawlu `Alayhim Bima Zalamu Fahum La Yantiquna
Alam Yaraw 'Anna Ja`alna Al-Layla Liyaskunu Fihi Wa An-Nahara Mubsiraan 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yu'uminuna
Wa Yawma Yunfakhu Fi As-Suri Fafazi`a Man Fi As-Samawati Wa Man Fi Al-'Arđi 'Illa Man Sha'a Allahu Wa Kullun 'Atawhu Dakhirina
Wa Tara Al-Jibala Tahsabuha Jamidatan Wa Hiya Tamurru Marra As-Sahabi Sun`a Allahi Al-Ladhi 'Atqana Kulla Shay'in 'Innahu Khabirun Bima Taf`aluna
Man Ja'a Bil-Hasanati Falahu Khayrun Minha Wa Hum Min Faza`in Yawma'idhin 'Aminuna
Wa Man Ja'a Bis-Sayyi'ati Fakubbat Wujuhuhum Fi An-Nari Hal Tujzawna 'Illa Ma Kuntum Ta`maluna
Innama 'Umirtu 'An 'A`buda Rabba Hadhihi Al-Baldati Al-Ladhi Harramaha Wa Lahu Kullu Shay'in Wa 'Umirtu 'An 'Akuna Mina Al-Muslimina
Wa 'An 'Atluwa Al-Qur'ana Famani Ahtada Fa'innama Yahtadi Linafsihi Wa Man Đalla Faqul 'Innama 'Ana Mina Al-Mundhirina
Wa Quli Al-Hamdu Lillahi Sayurikum 'Ayatihi Fata`rifunaha Wa Ma Rabbuka Bighafilin `Amma Ta`maluna
